hero.title: About SRA Africa
hero.subtitle: Pioneers of sustainable development and innovation in Africa for over a decade

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: SRA Africa is committed to supporting organizations, governments and businesses in their transformation towards sustainable and inclusive development. We firmly believe in the immense potential of the African continent and work to reveal it through innovative and adapted solutions.
mission.description2: Our unique approach combines local expertise, cutting-edge technologies and proven methodologies to create a positive and lasting impact on the communities we serve.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the reference partner for the sustainable transformation of Africa, contributing to the emergence of a prosperous, innovative and environmentally respectful continent.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide each of our actions

engagement.title: Commitment
engagement.description: We are fully committed to each project to guarantee exceptional results.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt the latest technologies and methodologies to create innovative solutions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients to co-create sustainable solutions.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: We aim for a positive and lasting impact on communities and the African economy.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Over a decade serving African development

2012.description: Creation of SRA Africa with the vision of transforming development in Africa

2015.description: Extension of our services to 5 African countries with 25 completed projects

2020.title: 2020 - Innovation
2020.description: Launch of our technology and digital innovation division

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

response.question: What are your response times?
response.answer: We commit to responding to all requests within 24 business hours.

consultation.question: Do you offer free consultations?
consultation.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation to assess your needs.

countries.question: In which countries do you operate?
countries.answer: We operate in 15 African countries with a strong presence in the Maghreb and West Africa.

projects.question: What types of projects do you accept?
projects.answer: We support all types of projects: private, public, NGO, from conception to implementation.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for sustainable development and innovation in Africa.
